document.full_text: retail sales rose 0.5 percent in april after a 0.9 percent increase in march, and the producer price index rose 0.8 percent last month, slightly above the gain in march.
document.title: energy costs lift retail sales and producer prices
lines_and_colors: retail sales rose 0.5 percent in april after a 0.9 percent increase in march, and the producer price index rose 0.8 percent last month, slightly above the gain in march.
